label.text: CDT stations file of the Water Balance on day 1
CDT stations file containing the SWHC data
netCDF file of the Water Balance on day 1
netCDF file containing the SWHC data

content.text: CDT stations data format file containing the water balance on the first day of calculation, the data must have the same stations as the Precipitation and PET data
CDT station data format file containing the soil water holding capacity data, the data must have the same stations as the Precipitation and PET data
A netCDF file containing the water balance on the first day of calculation, the grid must have the same resolution and extent as the Precipitation and PET
A netCDF file containing the soil water holding capacity data, the grid must have the same resolution and extent as the Precipitation and PET
